divs: Sighting DetailsI do not recall the details of date but it was reported the next day in the Norwich Bulletin, in Connecticut. Around early 90's. A clip from a UFO show almost 20 years laer showed the thing I saw. It seemed out of focus, that made it especially memeorable, hauntingly nenorable.
Summary: A ball, out of focus, arc above the woods and highway, orange bottom, green top.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Norwich
There were no other sightings in Norwich on or around September 15th 1993
